text: William Gillies (15 September 1914 - 17 December 1986) was a Scottish sports shooter. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics representing Hong Kong. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Hong Kong male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Hong Kong Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing Category:Scottish male sport shooters
title: William Gillies (sport shooter)
